settings.subheading-column2: THIS MULTITASKING POWDER GIVES YOU MANYDIFFERENT STYLES ALL IN ONE BOTTLE.
settings.rich-text:
With one single bottle, you can replace every product you have in your arsenal.

At only 25 grams, Filoso Hair Styling Powder lasts an average of 2-4 months with daily use. Itâ€™s also lightweight, making it easy to carry with you for those quick touch-ups on the go.

To apply it, simply hold horizontally and tap 5-7 times over the hair to create a natural textured finish, instantly giving you the feeling of confidence and satisfaction.

Try it today, and see what Filoso Hair Styling powder can do for you.
